srm_base_field

Base class for a field in a register.

A field is a contingous set of bits accessed indivisibly by sw. This base class keeps the size in bits and the access policy of the field.  This is a base class and should not be used directly by the user.

Summary
srm_base_field
Base class for a field in a register.
Class Declaration
virtual class srm_base_field
Initialization
newCreate a new base field instance.
Introspection
get_nameReturn the name of the field.
get_full_nameReturn the full hierarichal name of the field.
get_parentReturn the pointer to the register to which the field belongs.
get_n_bitsReturn the size of the field in bits.
get_lsb_posReturn the lsb of the field in the register.
is_volatileReturns true if the field is volatile.
Access
get_bytesVirtual function that will be implemented by srm_field.
set_bytesVirtual function that will be implemented by srm_field.
Field Policy
set_policySet policy of a field as per address map.
get_policyReturn the policy for the address map.
Private
resetVirtual function implemented by subclass to reset the field.
__initializeInitialize the state from the current value.

Initialization

new

function new( string  name,
srm_base_reg  parent,
int  n_bits,
int  lsb_pos,
bit  volatile )

Create a new base field instance.

parent represents the register to which the field belongs.  n_bits represents the size of the field in bits.  lsb_pos represents the least significant position of the field.  volatile represents whether the field is volatile ie modified by design.

Introspection

get_name

function string get_name()

Return the name of the field.

get_full_name

function string get_full_name()

Return the full hierarichal name of the field.

This returns the path starting with the root node of the design hierarchy.

get_parent

function srm_base_reg get_parent()

Return the pointer to the register to which the field belongs.

get_n_bits

function int get_n_bits()

Return the size of the field in bits.

get_lsb_pos

function int get_lsb_pos()

Return the lsb of the field in the register.

is_volatile

function bit is_volatile()

Returns true if the field is volatile.

A field written by design.  These values cannot be predicted by the model and so are skipped during checking.

Access

get_bytes

pure virtual function srm_data_t get_bytes()

Virtual function that will be implemented by srm_field.

A field is a template class.  This function converts the template data into a list of bytes so that I can treat them in a generic way.

set_bytes

pure virtual function void set_bytes( const ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

Virtual function that will be implemented by srm_field.

This function converts the list of bytes into the template parameter of the field class.

Field Policy

set_policy

virtual function void set_policy( string  addr_map_name,
srm_base_field_policy  policy )

Set policy of a field as per address map.

addr_map_name represents the address map.

policy represents the access policy.

A field may have different policy (like read_write, read_only) as per the address map.

get_policy

virtual function srm_base_field_policy get_policy( string  addr_map_name )

Return the policy for the address map.

addr_map_name represents the address map.

Private

reset

virtual function void reset( string  kind )

Virtual function implemented by subclass to reset the field.

kind represents the type of reset.  A field can have multiple reset values depending on the type of reset.

__initialize

virtual function void __initialize( srm_base_field  obj )

Initialize the state from the current value.

Used by the framework to create a clone for new entry in the register array.
